rules.ruleString: (Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ETC1000, ETW1000, ETW1102, ETX1100, STA1010} and  Incompatible with (I/W) {ETW1102, FIT1006})
(Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ETC1000, ETW1000, ETW1102, ETX1100, MTH1030, STA1010} and  Incompatible with (I/W) {ETW1102, FIT1006})

proh: STA1010, ETC1000, ETW1000, ETW1102, ETX1100, FIT1006, MTH1030. Note that SCI1020 is an introductory unit and students who have already completed one of these prohibited units cannot subsequently enrol in SCI1020. Students who have completed MTH1030 should enrol in STA1010 instead.
description: Scientific method. The role of mathematical models in science. Principles of experimental and sampling design, data acquisition, analysis and presentation of data. Hypothesis testing and confidence intervals. Relationship between quantitative variables. Communication of scientific information.
